message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a fair price considering its value.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $12,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $13,500.  It's a good compromise, and it still gives you a good deal. Let's try to come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13,000, but no higher. Can you meet me there?
